title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 01 October 2012 - XWiki
content:

11:24 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
11:27 <vmassol> tillo: hi  
11:29 <vmassol> I've made a mistake, I rejected your email to the security list when I've moderated it. I should have accepted it, it's just that you'd have needed to ask for access permission on the devs list if you wanted to see our answers to it. See http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/MailingLists#HPrivateMailingLists  
11:29 <vmassol> tillo: you could resend it and I'll accept it this time  
11:29 <vmassol> sorry about that  
11:44 <+tmortagne> guys when did we dropped the IE6 support ?  
11:44 <+tmortagne> before 3.5 ?  
11:44 <vmassol> http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/BrowserSupportStrategy  
11:44 <vmassol> XE 3.3M1  
11:47 <+tmortagne> ok thanks  
11:53 <vmassol> sdumitriu: ping  
11:54 <vmassol> sdumitriu: unping  
11:54 <vmassol> (found the answer to my question)  
12:02 <vmassol> yeah got HSQLDB working with virtual mode and with DBCP :)  
12:09 <silviar> has joined #xwiki  
12:18 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
12:29 <Enygma`> has quit  
12:50 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
12:51 <vmassol> i'm so happy….took me so long to figure it out...  
12:52 <+sburjan> :)  
12:52 <+sburjan> so now we support XEM on MySQL and HSQLDB also ? :)  
12:53 <vmassol> and oracle  
12:53 <vmassol> would be good that you retest it if you haven't done so for a while...  
12:54 <+sburjan> retest what ?  
12:54 <vmassol> oracle on xem  
12:54 <+sburjan> ok  
12:54 <vmassol> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Virtualization  
12:54 <vmassol> "Databases known to work are: MySQL, Oracle and HSQLDB (starting with XWiki 4.3M1)"  
12:54 <+sburjan> didn't knew we supported Oracle for XEM's  
12:55 <+sburjan> so only postgres is left without support for this  
12:55 <+sburjan> i'll take a look at oracle, maybe today. (I have some issues with the test machine)  
12:57 <mflorea> has quit  
13:19 <vmassol> sburjan: ok thanks  
13:33 <vmassol> hmm seems I've caused this: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/1808/testReport/junit/org.xwiki.test.escaping/AllTests/org\_xwiki\_test\_escaping\_AllTests/  
13:33 <vmassol> looking into it  
14:04 <ries> has joined #xwiki  
14:16 <vmassol> cjd: seems commit notifications don't reach the list any more…  
14:17 <tmortagne> has quit  
14:25 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:29 <silviar> has quit  
14:29 <vdox2> has joined #xwiki  
15:07 <vdox2> has left #xwiki  
15:11 <polx> has quit  
15:12 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
15:41 <mrvanes> has joined #xwiki  
15:43 <mrvanes> I can't send emails using the share by email feature in 4.2-RC1. I get and error indicating my server was at error (email server error) but there is no port 25 communication, and I can send mail without problem to this server from commandline and test mail extension  
15:44 <mrvanes> There's no error or exception in catalina.out as well  
15:44 <mrvanes> Also, no javascript error on the page  
15:45 <mrvanes> Configured my mailserver in preferences correctly of course  
16:06 <mflorea> has quit  
16:08 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
16:12 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
16:27 <ries> has left #xwiki  
16:56 <+mflorea> vmassol: linkchecker tests fail with an exception related to DBCP pool. The root cause is Caused by: org.hsqldb.HsqlException: unexpected token: REGULAR .  
16:57 <+sburjan> mrvanes: let me check  
16:57 <vmassol> mflorea: do you have a url?  
16:57 <+mflorea> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise/9418/consoleFull (it's huge)  
16:57 <+mflorea> wait  
16:58 <+mflorea> not that  
16:58 <+mflorea> just a sec  
16:58 <+mflorea> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-linkchecker-test-tests/2627/consoleFull  
16:58 <+mflorea> look for "Could not create a DBCP pool"  
17:00 <vmassol> hmm strange  
17:00 <mrvanes> sburjan: I've got to go now, maybe later? I created a Jira ticket for it here http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8264  
17:00 <vmassol> I've rebuilt XE with hsqldb 2.2.9 and I've ran it and it worked fine  
17:00 <+sburjan> mrvanes: ok, it's okay if you created the issue  
17:00 <vmassol> must be related to the functional tests setup  
17:01 <vmassol> testing  
17:01 <+mflorea> probably  
17:01 <mrvanes> sburjan: I did  
17:05 <mrvanes> has quit  
17:17 <vmassol> mflorea: I think I've fixed it, works locally now  
17:17 <+mflorea> great, thanks  
17:17 <vmassol> (I don't really understand why what I did fixed it, but it seems to work...)  
17:17 <+mflorea> :)  
17:22 <sburjan> has quit  
17:38 <evalica> has quit  
17:41 <Enygma`> has quit  
17:47 <fmancinelli> has quit  
18:17 <vmassol> hmm I wonder why these docs are always loaded from the DB even after you've executed the page several times (tested on the home page): https://gist.github.com/3812780  
18:17 <vmassol> (check bottom of gist)  
18:17 <vmassol> shouldn't they be in the cache?  
18:24 <vmassol> sburjan`: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8264 looks like a blocker since it's a regression  
18:26 <vmassol> would be great sdumitriu if you could have a quick look at http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8264 to see if it's caused by your commit in 4.2RC1  
18:26 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: OK  
18:26 <vmassol> it's a big regression, a pity we don't have any functional test for the feature (apparently)  
18:26 <vmassol> thanks

22:21 <+sburjan`> vmassol: not to self. I'll mark all future regressions as blockers  
22:21 <+sburjan`> \*note  
22:22 <vmassol> yep  
22:22 <+sburjan`> didn't knew about this rule until now  
22:22 <+sburjan`> but it makes perfect sense  
22:23 <vmassol> regressions are important  
23:39 <vmassol> has quit  
23:40 <polx> Hello all, does anyone know the recommended values for connection.pool\_size?  
23:55 <jvdrean> has quit
